page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Unemployment is a serious problem in the Maybole area. As elsewhere,the effects are most felt amongst the young people in the community. There was little awareness of local facilities for the unemployed amongst those contacted for this project. Disillusionment on the part of the young was matched by depression on the part of unemployed heads of families. Even when another wage was coming into the household to supplement State benefits, the total income was felt to be inadequate to meet their needs. The community education service runs various projects for the unemployed liasing with government schemes. The Speakers club provides a social afternoon for the local unemployed. Recent expansion of provision in education allows unemployed adults to attend local school courses.
